description: Details required for Condition 5 (Fire Safety Strategy) of planning permission 23/02356/HOU (Erection of a single storey rear and front porch extension with internal alterations)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The submitted Firse Safety Statement does not include all of the relevant details to satisfy policy D12A of the London Plan (2021) and only includes limited/generic basic information with insufficient detail or plans, specific to the site/development. It therefore does not demonstrate that the development would be safe for its lifetime and, as such, this condition cannot be discharged.
